cgcloud__User_Document_Activity__c.name: cgcloud__User_Document_Activity__c
cgcloud__User_Document_Activity__c.description: Stores the details of the relationship between the daily report and user activity.

cgcloud__Hours__c.description: Number of hours spent for the activity.

cgcloud__Minutes__c.description: Number of minutes spent for the activity.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the user document template activity record.
